key.name: paste-button
key.summary: Add button to paste an entry
key.description: If true, adds another button to each menu entry that lets you immediately paste it

key.name: pinned-on-bottom
key.summary: Display the pinned section on the bottom
key.description: If true, places the "pinned" section on the bottom

key.name: enable-deletion
key.summary: Enable the deletion of clipboard items from your history
key.description: If true, displays 'delete' buttons on each item, and a 'Clear History' option

key.name: history-size
key.summary: The number of items to save in history

key.name: display-mode
key.summary: What to display in top bar

key.name: disable-down-arrow
key.summary: Remove down arrow in top bar

key.name: clear-on-boot
key.summary: Clear clipboard history on every system reboot.

key.name: preview-size
key.summary: Amount of visible characters for clipboard items
key.description: The number of characters to display for every clipboard item in the history menu

key.name: topbar-preview-size
key.summary: Amount of visible characters in topbar
key.description: The number of characters to display for current clipboard item in the topbar

key.name: cache-size
key.summary: The allowed size for the registry cache file in MB
key.description: If the cache overflows this limit, the file will be overriden. High limit might cause slowness of shell startup.

key.name: cache-only-favorites
key.summary: Disable the registry cache file for favorites and use memory only
key.description: Contents which are not favorites are not stored and retrieved from a cache (registry.txt) file. This can avoid writing passwords to a plaintext file, but at the cost of persistant history. Your clipboard history, except favorite items, is lost after a gnome-shell session ends or the extension is reloaded.

key.name: notify-on-copy
key.summary: Show notification on copy to clipboard
key.description: If true, a notification is shown when content is copied to clipboard.

key.name: confirm-clear
key.summary: Show confirmation dialog on Clear History
key.description: If true, a confirmation dialog is shown when attempting to Clear History.

key.name: strip-text
key.summary: Remove whitespace around text
key.description: If true, white spaces around text will be removed.

key.name: move-item-first
key.summary: Move items to the top of the list when selected.
key.description: If true, move items to the top of the list when it is selected.

key.name: keep-selected-on-clear
key.summary: Keep selected item on clear
key.description: Whether to keep the currently selected entry in the clipboard after clearing the history

key.name: enable-keybindings
key.summary: Enable the keyboard shortcuts
key.description: If true, user can delete and cycle through the history with keyboard shortcuts

key.name: clear-history
key.summary: Key to clear the history

key.name: prev-entry
key.summary: Key to cycle to the previous entry in the clipboard

key.name: next-entry
key.summary: Next entry
key.description: Key to cycle to the next entry in the clipboard

key.name: toggle-menu
key.summary: Toggle the menu
key.description: Key to toggle the clipboard menu

key.name: private-mode-binding
key.summary: Toggle "Private Mode"
key.description: Key to toggle the private mode
